description: 56.' is printed at the foot of the title page.| Dated from examination of text and style.| Title page includes illustration of a standing figure holding a coat with a crown above him. This differs from the copies at [Ao].8/3.1(2), Hall.224.h.4(1), Hall.224.h.5(29), L.C.2852.C(6) and Mas.619(16). The text is identical.
